Quick search

Carreau-Yasuda equation¶

\[\eta^*(\omega) = \eta_\infty + (\eta_0-\eta_\infty)\left( 1 + (\lambda\omega)^a \right)^{(n-1)/a}\]

Warning

Due to the wide range viscosity, the theory should be fitted using a logarithmic view (logetastar)
